mapper.sql: audit_id, real_name, id_number, phone_number, loan_manay, perlods, refund_manay, loan_time, auditor, refund_time, overdue_day, state
mapper.select:
SELECT audit_id,real_name,id_number,phone_number,loan_manay,perlods,refund_manay,loan_time,state,auditor FROM audit_task WHERE 1 = 1
and real_name like concat('%',concat(#{realName},'%'))
and id_number like concat('%',concat(#{idNumber},'%'))
and phone_number like concat('%',concat(#{phoneNumber},'%'))
and auditor like concat('%',concat(#{auditor},'%'))
ORDER BY audit_id DESC

SELECT audit_id,real_name,id_number,phone_number,loan_manay,perlods,refund_manay,loan_time,state,auditor FROM audit_task WHERE 1 = 1
and real_name like concat('%',concat(#{realName},'%'))
and id_number like concat('%',concat(#{idNumber},'%'))
and phone_number like concat('%',concat(#{phoneNumber},'%'))
and auditor = #{auditor} ORDER BY audit_id DESC

SELECT audit_id,real_name,id_number,phone_number,loan_manay,perlods,refund_manay,state FROM audit_task WHERE 1 = 1
and real_name like concat('%',concat(#{realName},'%'))
and id_number like concat('%',concat(#{idNumber},'%'))
and phone_number like concat('%',concat(#{phoneNumber},'%'))
ORDER BY audit_id DESC
